summary:
The Security Council, 
Noting with regret the death of Judge James Richard Crawford on 31 May 2021, 
Noting a vacancy in the International Court of Justice for the remainder of the term of the deceased Judge, 
Noting the date of the election to fill the vacancy shall be fixed by the Security Council as per article 14 of the Statute, 
Decides the election to fill the vacancy shall take place on 5 November 2021 at a meeting of the Security Council and the General Assembly at its seventy-sixth session.
